name: Pacho
description:
Combine the powers of good and evil to flip upside down reality in this game for Windows.

This is Francisco, known to his friends as Pacho...

He is from this land of vallenato music called Colombia, a man with the music in his heart.

God blessed Pacho with talent to play the accordion, and also an angel to look over him: Barachiel, a high-level seraph who lives in Pacho's sombrero.

Protecting Pacho is a very important mission. Pacho is so special... That Satan themself attacked him... As an attempt to silence his music.

I dare you to travel thru limbo and face the Devil in this platformer, puzzle, rhythm game based on the Legend of Francisco “El Hombre”. An angel and a demon will be your sidekicks on this travel where you will need to turn gravity upside down to help Pacho to find the way out of the limbo, to help a man with an angel on his head and a demon on his heart…

CREDITS PSYCHES MEDIA TEAM
